item.title: By: Peter Anselmo
item.dc:creator: Peter Anselmo
item.description: Thanks for the presentation! I thought it was the best one of the day. Chock full of useful stuff to geek-out on. I'll be busy benchmarking for weeks.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the presentation! I thought it was the best one of the day. Chock full of useful stuff to geek-out on. I’ll be busy benchmarking for weeks.

item.title: By: Laura Moncur

item.description:
Congratulations!
You always do such a good job! The Reno people are lucky to have you presenting!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/04/14/reno-tahoe-wordcamp/#comment-2809">Lloyd Budd</a>.
I'll be talking about WordPress Performance & Scalability after lunch - http://www.renotahoewordcamp.com/schedule/
I love the smell of memcache in the morning :-)
